basics.name: Martin Truong
basics.label: Junior Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a junior software engineer with over 1.5 years of experience working in full-stack and software development roles.

education.area: Bachelor of Science (Honours) - Computer Science, Data Science specialization

work.name: Ontario Tech University
work.summary: Led weekly lab sessions for a first year introductory Python course.
highlights: Led weekly lab sessions for a first year introductory Python course.
responsibilities: Guided students through Python coding exercises and writing testing code with Pytest.
Held regular office hours to support students with course content, troubleshooting programming and version control challenges.
Graded and tested code for assignments and exams, providing detailed feedback to help students improve their coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
achievements: Increased student engagement and improved exam performance.

work.name: Vialab
work.summary: Performed various administrative and IT tasks for a data science research lab.
highlights: Performed various administrative and IT tasks for a data science research lab, including the maintenance and management of the lab's WordPress website.
responsibilities: Responsible for maintaining and managing the lab's WordPress website.
Wrote Python scripts with Pandas to assist a professor in cleaning and tabulating research data.
Collaborated with a colleague on the maintenance and testing of old research projects, fixing bugs, and ensuring that past projects run smoothly.
achievements: Successfully migrated the website's codebase to the latest PHP version, adopting modern best practices.

work.name: Dragon Lubes
work.summary: Built a full-stack e-commerce website for a local small business.
highlights: Built a full-stack e-commerce website for a local small business, migrating their codebase from Google Sites to Next.js.
responsibilities: Developed the frontend in Next.js with React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.
Developed the backend with TypeScript, React Query, and GraphQL connected to Shopify's Storefront API.
Worked directly with the CEO to design and develop new website features to facilitate business needs.
achievements: Successfully migrated their website from Google Sites to Vercel.
Completely rebuilt and designed new layouts for the landing page and catalog.
Built shopping cart components and implemented checkout webhooks to product pages.

projects.name: A.Iert
projects.description: An LLM with access to real-time disaster alerts to aid people in their safety and to take precautions.
highlights: Python script fetches real-time alerts from a weather API
Cohere powered chatbot provides instant responses to user queries
Frontend built with Streamlit, designed to be lightweight and accessible

projects.name: Iris
projects.description: A full-stack web application that allows for live, translated transcriptions with uses in a wide variety of settings.
highlights: Frontend built with React and React Router
Backend built with Python connected to AssemblyAI and Google Translate API
